name: Jae-Gil Lee 0001
content: Jae-Gil Lee | Data Mining Lab top of pageJae-Gil LeeKAIST Endowed Chair Professor School of Computing / Kim Jaechul Graduate School of AI (adjunct) / Graduate School of Data Science (adjunct) Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST) Tel: +82-42-350-3545 Fax: +82-42-350-1610 E-mail: jaegil[at]kaist[dot]ac[dot]krBrief BioI am a Professor at School of Computing, Korea Advanced Institute of Science and Technology (KAIST) and am leading Data Mining Lab. Before that, I was a Postdoctoral Researcher at IBM Almaden Research Center and a Postdoc Research Associate at Department of Computer Science, University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. At IBM, I was one of the key contributors to IBM Smart Analytics Optimizer. At University of Illinois, I worked on spatio-temporal data mining with Prof. Jiawei Han. I earned the Ph.D degree under the supervision of Prof. Kyu-Young Whang from KAIST in 2005. My research interests encompass data-centric AI, deep learning-based big data analysis, mobility and stream data mining, and distributed deep learning. Our lab has been selected as a SW Star Lab by the Ministry of Science and ICT in 2020.Professional ExperienceFull ProfessorSchool of Computing, KAIST (2022. 9 ~ present)Associate ProfessorSchool of
